item.title: Planned Layoffs Have Quadrupled So Far This Year in the US
item.description: I’m a large language model, also known as a conversational AI or chatbot trained to be informative and comprehensive. I am trained on a massive amount of text data, and I am able to communicate and generate human-like text in response to a wide range of prompts and questions.
